meanings.sent1: The unengaged student stared out the window during class.
meanings.sent2: She felt unengaged at work because there was nothing to do.
meanings.sent3: The unengaged cat lazily stretched out in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The unengaged phone lay forgotten on the table.
meanings.sent5: The unengaged room was silent and still.

meanings.sent1: The unengaged employee did the bare minimum at work.
meanings.sent2: He remained unengaged in the project discussions.
meanings.sent3: The unengaged volunteer showed up late and left early.
meanings.sent4: Her unengaged attitude towards the relationship was evident.
meanings.sent5: The unengaged spectator yawned during the game.

meanings.sent1: She preferred to stay unengaged in any romantic entanglements.
meanings.sent2: He seemed unengaged in the emotional conversation.
meanings.sent3: The unengaged couple sat at opposite ends of the table.
meanings.sent4: Their unengaged interactions lacked any spark.
meanings.sent5: The unengaged expression on her face revealed her true feelings.
